gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 127, Hawks 119
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Hawks, 127-119. Jarrett Allen led Cleveland with 25 points and 14 rebounds as Donovan Mitchell added 22 points and a career-best 13 assists. Trae Young totaled 35 points (7-11 3PT), and 10 assists for the Hawks in the loss. The Cavaliers snap a three-game slide and improve to 14-12 on the year as the Hawks move to 10-15.
